question: Emma Morano, the world's oldest person has passed away. She hailed from which country?
explanation: Emma Martina Luigia Morano (117), the world\'s oldest woman, has recently passed away at Verbania in Italy on April 15, 2017. She was born on 29th November 1899 in the Piedmont region of Italy and was officially the last person born in the 1800s still living. She was the Guinness World Record holder for the oldest living person and oldest living woman. Upon Morano\'s death, Violet Brown from Jamaica became the world\'s oldest known person in the world.
